title: Large-Scale Workshop Integrating Multimedia Production and Instructional Design for Elementary Social Studies Education

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic instructional design and digital content creation experience
context.additional_context: An intensive course where elementary school teachers learn multimedia production and instructional design techniques applicable to actual classroom settings through case studies

learning_goals: Explain at least three stages of the multimedia content production process required in elementary social studies curricula.
Derive at least five interaction elements between instructional design and multimedia production by analyzing case studies.
Produce a video solution plan applicable to real classroom scenarios in a collaborative learning environment.

resources: Computer with Installed Video Editing Software License

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
